remarks: Two structures with the same base, hom-sets and composition operation are either both categories or neither.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jan-2017.)
statement:
catpropd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` D ) ) $.
catpropd.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( comf ` C ) = ( comf ` D ) ) $.
catpropd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. V ) $.
catpropd.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. W ) $.
catpropd $p |- ( ph -> ( C e. Cat <-> D e. Cat ) ) $.
